titleStmt.title: Heauen and earth reconcil'd A sermon preached at Saint Paules church in Bedford, October. 3. 1612. At the visitation of the right Wor. M. Eland, Archdeacon of Bedford. By Tho. Adams ...
titleStmt.author: Adams, Thomas, fl. 1612-1653.

publicationStmt.publisher: Printed by W. W[hite] for Clement Knight, and are to be sold at his shop in Paules Church-yard at the signe of the holy Lambe,

notesStmt.note: Reproduction of the original in Cambridge University Library.

place.placeName: his shop in Paules Church-yard at the signe of the holy Lambe
